cu.explanation_en: Setting MNC to 999 exceeds the valid range for mobile network codes (000-999 but typically 2-3 digits), causing PLMN configuration errors.

du.explanation_en: Setting nrofUplinkSlots to 15 exceeds the valid range for TDD slot configuration, causing frame structure errors.
du.explanation_zh: 將 nrofUplinkSlots 設定為 15 超過 TDD 時隙配置的有效範圍，會導致幀結構錯誤。
